title: TIS FTUI
description: A website for the Technique Informal School of FTUI, featuring a modern design and responsive elements.
longDescription: Built using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, this project showcases a clean and modern design with responsive elements. It includes features like a dynamic course catalog, values, vision, and gallery sections.

title: Exertion
description: Contributed to the authentication flow of a full-stack web application.
longDescription: Built the login and authentication system using Next.js, TypeScript, and raw SQL. Integrated secure credential handling, session management, and backend validation. Ensured reliability and security throughout the user login experience.
